communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Lettes from Jail Standards Commission informing Sheriff McNamara of Complaint filed by Bernadette Feazell, ALL Letters from jail standards commission to MCSO and or Sheriff McNamara informing him of non compliance status on jail list. All Appeals filed by McLennan County to recent non compliance. All interoffice memos, reprimands, or correspondence between Sheriff McNamara, Cody Blossman, Major Pam Whitlock and others concerning recent failure to take prisoner to dialysis and subsequent complaint and activities surrounding the Complaint to Jail Standards and results. THIS will probably go to the AG's office once again and if they charge you people, well, it's because they don't want this known and the subsequent coverups. JAIL NON COMPLIANCE is not gossip by the way considering the severity of kidney disease AND the known lack of supervision at the jail.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Resignation letters and effective dates from Chris Eubanks and Rebecca Eubanks

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

This is specifically directed to the Department of State Division of Building Standards and Codes Oversight Unit.

A copy of all of the following cases: 7667, 7914, 7950, and 7963.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

George Johnston

title: Texas Jail Standards Commission, Austin, Texas

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Letters to Sheriff Parnell McNamara informing him of Complaint signed by Bernadette Feazell. The outcome of that Complaint against McLennan County, and copy of the Appeal filed by McLennan County after the jail was put on the non compliance list then removed for the appeal. Thank you so very much.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I would like all resignation letters from November and December, including any from Major Pam Whitlock leaving the last day of December. Thanks ever so much.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
